entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -38.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Akulivik Airport 1:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -38.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -43.5°C
Wind: SSE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 34. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High minus 34. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 36. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
